branchCategory.name: Standard with Linear Guide - MHZ
branchCategory.description: <p>Gripper series MHZ2 has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It has mounitng versatility on three sides, in five configurations. Available in single acting (N.O., N.C.) and double acting.</p>

branchItem.name: MHZ2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, Standard
branchItem.description: The MHZ2 Series gripper has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It has mounting versatility on three sides, in five configurations. Available in single acting (N.O., N.C.) and double acting.

branchItem.name: MHZA2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, Compact
branchItem.description: The MHZ2 Series gripper has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It has mounting versatility on three sides, in five configurations. Available in single acting (N.O., N.C.) and double acting.

branchItem.name: MHZL2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, Long Stroke
branchItem.description: The MHZ2 Series gripper has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It has mounting versatility on three sides, in five configurations. Available in single acting (N.O., N.C.) and double acting.

branchItem.name: MHZJ2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, With Dust Cover
branchItem.description: The MHZ2 Series gripper has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It has mounting versatility on three sides, in five configurations. Available in single acting (N.O., N.C.) and double acting.

branchItem.name: MHZAJ2, Air Gripper, Parallel Type, Compact, With Dust Cover
branchItem.description: The MHZ2 Series gripper has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It has mounting versatility on three sides, in five configurations. Available in single acting (N.O., N.C.) and double acting.

branchItem.name: 11/22-MHZ2, Air Gripper, Clean Series
branchItem.description: The MHZ2 Series gripper has an integrated linear guide for high rigidity, positioned with two dowel pins to prevent guide slippage. It is designed for gripping workpieces in clean room environments. Available only in double acting.
